detectors.description: AddressLottery.participate() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xd4342df2c7cfe5938540648582c8d222f1513c50-AddressLottery.sol#46-57) uses a weak PRNG: luckyNumberOfAddress(msg.sender) == winnerLuckyNumber (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xd4342df2c7cfe5938540648582c8d222f1513c50-AddressLottery.sol#52)

AddressLottery.luckyNumberOfAddress(address) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xd4342df2c7cfe5938540648582c8d222f1513c50-AddressLottery.sol#59-62) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: n = uint256(keccak256()(uint256(addr),secretSeed)[0]) % 8 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xd4342df2c7cfe5938540648582c8d222f1513c50-AddressLottery.sol#61)
